jiwithaye ee thiranathmaka awasthawa ma pasu kala hati bonda wu sihinayak se mata mawi pene.mata hadawath sathkamak kala yuthu ma wiya.sathkamin wisi hathara payakata pasu ma sihiya labana wita ma watakara gena sitiye sathkamata ma dirimath kala ma aadaraniya biriya ha daru pirisayi.owun balaporoththu dalwu dasin madesa bala siti hatith, anathuruwa na pirisa dadi sathkara eekakayen kadinamin pitath karunu hatith mata mathaka ya.in pasu ma langa ithiri wuye nirantharayen ma asalama gawasemin ma gana soya balu labala hedi dariyan pamani.mata mahath wedanawak danennata wuye ya.
